riscv32.name: b
riscv32.desc: 'B' (the collection of the Zba, Zbb, Zbs extensions).

riscv32.name: dlen-factor-2
riscv32.desc: Vector unit DLEN(data path width) is half of VLEN.

riscv32.name: experimental-smnpm
riscv32.desc: 'Smnpm' (Machine-level Pointer Masking for next lower privilege mode).

riscv32.name: experimental-ssnpm
riscv32.desc: 'Ssnpm' (Supervisor-level Pointer Masking for next lower privilege mode).

riscv32.name: forced-atomics
riscv32.desc: Assume that lock-free native-width atomics are available.

riscv32.name: no-sink-splat-operands
riscv32.desc: Disable sink splat operands to enable .vx, .vf,.wx, and .wf instructions.

riscv32.name: no-trailing-seq-cst-fence
riscv32.desc: Disable trailing fence for seq-cst store..

riscv32.name: optimized-zero-stride-load
riscv32.desc: Optimized (perform fewer memory operations)zero-stride vector load.

riscv32.name: predictable-select-expensive
riscv32.desc: Prefer likely predicted branches over selects.

riscv32.name: shcounterenw
riscv32.desc: 'Shcounterenw' (Support writeable hcounteren enable bit for any hpmcounter that is not read-only zero).

riscv32.name: shgatpa
riscv32.desc: 'Sgatpa' (SvNNx4 mode supported for all modes supported by satp, as well as Bare).

riscv32.name: shifted-zextw-fusion
riscv32.desc: Enable SLLI+SRLI to be fused when computing (shifted) word zero extension.

riscv32.name: shvsatpa
riscv32.desc: 'Svsatpa' (vsatp supports all modes supported by satp).

riscv32.name: sscounterenw
riscv32.desc: 'Sscounterenw' (Support writeable scounteren enable bit for any hpmcounter that is not read-only zero).

riscv32.name: tagged-globals
riscv32.desc: Use an instruction sequence for taking the address of a global that allows a memory tag in the upper address bits.

riscv32.name: unaligned-scalar-mem
riscv32.desc: Has reasonably performant unaligned scalar loads and stores.

riscv32.name: unaligned-vector-mem
riscv32.desc: Has reasonably performant unaligned vector loads and stores.

riscv32.name: za128rs
riscv32.desc: 'Za128rs' (Reservation Set Size of at Most 128 Bytes).

riscv32.name: za64rs
riscv32.desc: 'Za64rs' (Reservation Set Size of at Most 64 Bytes).

riscv32.name: zca
riscv32.desc: 'Zca' (part of the C extension, excluding compressed floating point loads/stores).

riscv32.name: zexth-fusion
riscv32.desc: Enable SLLI+SRLI to be fused to zero extension of halfword.

riscv32.name: zextw-fusion
riscv32.desc: Enable SLLI+SRLI to be fused to zero extension of word.

riscv32.name: ziccamoa
riscv32.desc: 'Ziccamoa' (Main Memory Supports All Atomics in A).

riscv32.name: ziccif
riscv32.desc: 'Ziccif' (Main Memory Supports Instruction Fetch with Atomicity Requirement).

riscv32.name: ziccrse
riscv32.desc: 'Ziccrse' (Main Memory Supports Forward Progress on LR/SC Sequences).

riscv32.name: zve32f
riscv32.desc: 'Zve32f' (Vector Extensions for Embedded Processors with maximal 32 EEW and F extension).

riscv32.name: zve32x
riscv32.desc: 'Zve32x' (Vector Extensions for Embedded Processors with maximal 32 EEW).

riscv32.name: zve64d
riscv32.desc: 'Zve64d' (Vector Extensions for Embedded Processors with maximal 64 EEW, F and D extension).

riscv32.name: zve64f
riscv32.desc: 'Zve64f' (Vector Extensions for Embedded Processors with maximal 64 EEW and F extension).

riscv32.name: zve64x
riscv32.desc: 'Zve64x' (Vector Extensions for Embedded Processors with maximal 64 EEW).
